00037 void RequestHandlerGetSchema::run() {
00038   ResponseCallbackGetSchema cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00039   const char *tableName;
00040   size_t remaining = m_event_ptr->messageLen - 2;
00041   uint8_t *msgPtr = m_event_ptr->message + 2;
00042 
00043   // table name
00044   if (!Serialization::decode_string(&msgPtr, &remaining, &tableName)) {
00045     HT_ERROR("Encoding problem with Create Table message");
00046     cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Encoding problem with Create Table message");
00047     return;
00048   }
00049 
00050   m_master->get_schema(&cb, tableName);
00051 }
